name: AcumenIST
goal: AcumenIST is a new consultancy initiative provided by experienced business leaders with a pronounced track record in both scientific research, development and innovation, as well as in public and regulatory affairs.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
nanotechnology / nanomaterials / chemical regulation; biotechnology / GMO / gene editing regulation; synthetic biology regulation.
medical device regulations
EU research funding; science, technology and innovation policies
